Docs.summary: A Class representing a LoadTestingQuota along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetLoadTestingQuotaResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetLoadTestingQuota method.
